name: Road Racer - 3D Traffic Racing
description:
Road Racer is a endless arcade racing game. Drive through highway traffic, earn cash, upgrade your car and buy new ones. .

Features:
- Impressive 3D graphics.
- Smooth and realistic car handling.
- 15 different cars to choose from (more cars will be added in future updates.)
- 3 detailed environment: Day, Night, Rainy.
- 3 game modes: One Way, Two Way, Time Attack.
- Rich types of NPC traffic including trucks, buses, SUVs and Sedans.
- Customize car paint and wheels.
- Multiple Camera Angles: There are 3 camera angles. Top,Back and Hood.

Gameplay And Tips:
- Tilt or Touch the screen to steer wheels.
- Touch gas button to accelerate.
- Touch brake button to slow down.
- Drive faster to get more score and cash.
- When driving with 100 kmh or more, overtake cars closely to get bonus scores and cash
- Driving in opposite direction in two way mode gives more extra score and cash

Road Racer will be updated constantly. Please rate and give your feedback for further improvement of the game.
